constituent: flock, old boy, mop, mouth, sheep
koohiiStory1: Good ol´ boys are like sheep; they tend to flock together.
koohiiStory2: A little girl herder calls out, "羊君、きて！" to the sheeps and they flock to her at once.
kunYomi: む.れる、む.れ、むら、むら.がる
readingExamples: 群れ (む.れ), 群れる (む.れる)
words: group, crowd, flock, herd, bevy, school, swarm, cluster (of stars), clump
